definition: to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: Any one who collaborates should be shot.
sentences.chinese: 与敌人勾结者一律枪决。

sentences.english: Therefore police have arrested Kenzaburou Ooe who lies, after several days, carries out executes by shooting.
sentences.chinese: 于是警察逮捕了说谎的大江健三郎，数日后执行枪决。

sentences.english: My orders are that one man in every ten shall be shot in this camp.
sentences.chinese: 我的命令是集中营里每十个人要有一个被枪决。

sentences.english: Public hangings and firing squads were common.
sentences.chinese: 公开的绞刑和枪决在这里频频上演。

sentences.english: A death sentence shall be executed by such means as shooting or injection.
sentences.chinese: 死刑采用枪决或者注射等方法执行。

sentences.english: This was more of an execution.
sentences.chinese: 这更像是一场执行枪决。

definition: to execute by firing squad/to shoot dead/fig. to discard/to get rid of
an execution/to put sb to death
to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
to behead sb and display the head in public
public trial (in a court of law)
to parade (a prisoner) through the streets
